Articles.Content:
I know this is probably the wrong place, but ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

Can anyone else get to the kerbal mods on Curse? Doesn't even return anything when searching "kerbal"
The link on the forums works just fine
guess I've got a bad route some place

Moved to The Kerbal Network.

Any luck connecting since? Have you tried another browser?
turns out it was IE. can get there with no problems with firefox.
